list_definition.definition: a tax charged for crossing a bridge, driving on certain roads etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: All cars pay a toll of $1

list_definition.definition: an amount of loss or damage suffered, eg as a result of disaster

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Every year there is a heavy toll of human lives on the roads.
